title: enable buckets
body: enable buckets is set to false in the script, can we please get a checkbox option for this.
author: zethfoxster

comments.body: All my images are different ratios and dimensions. Do I need to have buckets enabled? the default is off but didn't have a problem when I tried creating a LoRA a few weeks ago.

its cropping the images if you dont enable buckets and have a mix...which sometimes can end up cropping off faces, or key items in the images....this issue can be closed as he since added a method to edit that directly in the webui on the right side, you can just edit it to true.

satisfaction_conditions: Provides a user-accessible toggle for enabling/disabling buckets without script modification
Allows control over image cropping behavior for mixed-ratio/dimension datasets
